name: Rahim Zahor
story: Abdul-Mussawir Ajani was born and raised in a small village in Iran. He joined the Iranian army at the age of 18 and served for 10 years before leaving to join a private military company. After several years of mercenary work, he was recruited by the group known as OPFOR. He quickly rose through the ranks, and is now a Corporal and the Grenadier for his unit. Abdul-Mussawir is a devout Muslim and has two children with his wife back in Iran. Despite being away from his family, he remains committed to his duty and the cause.
